title: Pentridge: some ghosts and memories from the big house
subject_group: Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Prisons - Australia
Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Prisoners - Australia

description: An evocative record of Pentridge prison, one of Australia's most infamous penal establishments. The notorious criminal Mark 'Chopper' Read joins author Ray Mooney and former guards, governors and fellow inmates to relate stories of the harsh conditions and camaraderie shared by prisoners until the prison's closure in the early nineties.
